General case¶

Here we find some User case of General :

For index (homepage)¶

What happens when we try to access the homepage and it succeeds ? :

OcLettingsSiteViewsTest.test_index_view()¶
Test that the ‘index’ view returns a status code of 200

and uses the correct template.

For Sentry test trigger Exception¶

What happens when we try to run the Sentry trigger function ? :

OcLettingsSiteViewsTest.test_trigger_error_view()¶
Test that the ‘sentrytest’ view returns a status code of 500

and uses the ‘error.html’ template.
